# Steps to reproduce
1. Launch PowerShell application.
2. Resize PowerShell windows size to half on the screen.
3. Connect to some machine using ssh through PowerShell.
4. Resize PowerShell  windows size to full scree.
5. Press enter PowerShell  window automatically size to the windows size, what was it before ssh.


# Expected behavior
1. PowerShell  window size should be fullscreen 

# Actual behavior
1. PowerShell  windows is resizing automatically 


# Environment data

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

PSVersion                      5.1.17134.858
PSEdition                      Desktop

BuildVersion                   10.0.17134.858
CLRVersion                     4.0.30319.42000
WSManStackVersion              3.0
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
